name: Sonic Beacons
description:
SONIC BEACONS ...

...is a contemplative musical experience.  A walking simulator you play with your eyes closed. Follow and collect the sonic beacons to proceed. Relax and embark on an acoustic journey. 

READ ME FIRST: 

Make sure to wear headphones - they are crucial for navigating through the levels. 

Note: This is an audio game. There are no visuals apart from the menu! Just listen!

Best played in Google Chrome Browser. You can also download the game!

CONTROLS:

 Just use the arrow keys to move (forward, backwards, strafe left, strafe right)
